definitions: in the violent manner of an explosion

examples.text: some volcanoes erupt explosively while others just simmer along

shortDefinitions: in violent manner of an explosion

definitions: with an outburst of anger or controversy

examples.text: residents reacted explosively to the rumors

shortDefinitions: with outburst of anger or controversy

definitions: (with reference to an increase) suddenly and dramatically

examples.text: house prices have risen explosively over the past two years
the quiet town has grown explosively

shortDefinitions: (with reference to increase) suddenly and dramatically
